name: Patient diagnosis moderate
payload:
{"to":"+91TO_PHONE","body":"Your symptoms are Mild 

Things to take care of -
1) Keep track of the oxygen level at regular intervals.
2)Take the 6 minute walk test(3 times a day or when you feel uneasy), if your oxygen level falls more than 4 points during this test, please speak to your doctor immediately. Your condition can deteriorate in coming days 
3)Please avoid contact with any of your family members and follow strict hygiene.","sender":"+91FROM_PHONE","channel":"WhatsApp","from":"+91FROM_PHONE","type":"text"}

name: Patient diagnosis moderate
payload:
{"to":"+91TO_PHONE","body":"Your symptoms are Mild 

Things to take care of -
1) Keep track of the oxygen level at regular intervals.
2)Take the 6 minute walk test(3 times a day or when you feel uneasy), if your oxygen level falls more than 4 points during this test, please speak to your doctor immediately. Your condition can deteriorate in coming days 
3)Please avoid contact with any of your family members and follow strict hygiene.


In future - Consult a doctor, and hospitalisation might be required in future 

You are prescribed to take the following texts -1) Complete Hemogram (CBC), CRP
2)D-Dimer, LDH, Serum Ferritin


Type 1 üëâ If you wish to speak to a doctor,
Type 2 üëâ if you want to end this conversation","sender":"+91FROM_PHONE","channel":"WhatsApp","from":"+91FROM_PHONE","type":"text"}

name: Patient diagnosis mild
payload:
{"to":"+91TO_PHONE","body":"Your symptoms are Mild 

Things to take care of -
1) Keep track of the oxygen level at regular intervals.
2)Take the 6 minute walk test(3 times a day or when you feel uneasy), if your oxygen level falls more than 4 points during this test, please speak to your doctor immediately. Your condition can deteriorate in coming days 
3)Please avoid contact with any of your family members and follow strict hygiene.


You might need medical attention if - 
1)Difficulty in breathing 
2)Fever/ severe cough 
3)Oxygen level drops more than 4 points in the 6 min walk test.


Type 1 üëâ If you wish to speak to a doctor,
Type 2 üëâ if you want to end this conversation","sender":"+91FROM_PHONE","channel":"WhatsApp","from":"+91FROM_PHONE","type":"text"}
